title: Revenue per employee of leading tech companies 2018
yAxis: Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows the tech in the per with the highest employee gaming revenues in 2018 .
The location with the highest leading Revenue in the employee was unsurprisingly the Netflix Strip , Netflix totaling 2224555 million employee U.S. in employee gaming Revenue in 2018 .
gold: This statistic shows the revenue per employee of selected tech companies in 2018.
Netflix was the most effective company , generating over 2.22 million U.S. dollars of revenue per employee.
Apple ranked in second place with an annual revenue of 2.01 million U.S. dollars per employee .
